resources.string: Your order price is more than 5% higher than the last price, are you sure?
Your order price is more than 5% lower than the last price, are you sure?
Your order price will be %1$s higher than the latest market price. Please proceed cautiously.
Your order price will be %1$s lower than the latest market price. Please proceed cautiously.
If the last price rises to or above %1$s ,an order to buy %3$s at a price of %2$s will be placed.
If the last price drops to or below %1$s, an order to buy %3$s at a price of %2$s will be placed.
If the last price drops to or below %1$s, an order to sell %3$s at a price of %2$s will be placed.
If the last price rises to or above %1$s, an order to sell %3$s at a price of %2$s will be placed.
Limit buy price should be less than market price
Stop Price should be greater than market price
Stop Price should be greater than limit buy price
Limit sell price should be greater than market price
Stop Price should be less than market price
Stop Price should be less than limit sell price

To begin, you will need to install the #Google Authenticator# application on your phone.
Please save this key on paper. This key will allow you to recover your Google Authentication in case of phone loss.
Please enter the 16-digit key you just backed up.
You\'ll need to add a Binance account in your Google Authenticator app and manually enter the 16-digit key.
Google 2FA 16-digit Key do not match. Please try again.

You have enabled Google Authentication. If you need to disable it , please visit our website
(www.binance.com)
* For security purposes no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after modification of security methods.
A Stop-Limit order is an order to buy or sell a coin once the price reaches a specified price.

To place a stop-limit order (the trigger stop price should be higher than market price for buy order, and lower for sell order) and a limit order (the limit price should be lower than market price for buy order, and higher for sell order) at the same time. When either of the order pairs is triggered, the other order will be cancelled. And if either of the order pairs is cancelled, the other order will be cancelled, too.
The Stop Price cannot be equal to the Last Price.
Your current version is up to date
*For security purposes no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after disable of SMS Authentication.
*For security purposes no withdrawals are permitted for 24 hours after disable of Google Auth.
Large price difference between your order and the latest trade. Please proceed carefully.
We want to help you to use Binance and take advantage of all its features
You can check our help Center for common questions and tutorials
We have detected you are attempting to access your account from the following IP Address: %1$s and sent a confirmation email to you. Please follow the instructions to access your account.

Hi, thanks for reaching out. Our customer service team will be available from 9:00~21:00 during which you can contact us via chat or you can submit a ticket via support. Your cooperation is much appreciated.
Hello, our customer service team is currently unavailable. Any queries please kindly submit tickets to us, thank you for your cooperation.
If you choose to keep the conversation, it will be saved for 3 minutes, please come back soon
There are currently no agents online.
Start time must be earlier than end time
End time must be later than start time
Please select start and end time period within 3 months
Scan QR code only supports facial verification

Your facial verification has been successfully authenticated. Please be patient and wait for the result. We will complete the review process in 7–10 business days, and the result will be sent to your email address. Thank you for your patience.
Your facial verification has failed. You can try again through the facial verification page, or via the link we have sent to your email.
QR code failed, please try again
The network is abnormal, please try again
Facial verification failed, please try again

Once Face Verification has been completed, your account functionality will be upgraded. You initiated this verification process yourself, not by following a link sent to you by someone else. You assume full responsibility for any consequences resulting from completing this process.

Disabling your account will cause the following:

1.All pending withdrawals will be canceled.
2.All trading capacities for your account will be disabled.
3.All API keys for your account will be deleted.
4.All devices for your account will be deleted.
5.In order to reactivate your account, you will need to contact Binance support
Are you sure you want to disable your account?
Your account will take 7–10 days to reactivate my account through Customer Support.
These devices are currently allowed to access your account
Are you sure you want to delete this device?

to complete Corporate authentication.

An account may not be verified as both Personal and Corporate, so please choose appropriately.
An individual may only own/operate one account on our platform.
Your ID and Facial verification has failed.
Your Personal Verification request has been received and will be reviewed within 1-3 business days. In the meantime, you should receive an e-mail when complete.
Please enable SMS Auth or Google Auth first
Your system version is too low, Please go to www.binance.com for authentication.

Small balances(<0.001
BTC) are shown in Others
After turning off this function, you will be able to withdrawal to any withdrawal address
Binance has sent a verification email to your email address.Please follow the prompts in the email to disable withdrawal whitelisted.
Binance has sent a verification email to your email address.Please follow the prompts in the email to add the withdrawal address into whitelist.

If you haven’t received the email,please try the following: 
* Make sure the email address you provided is correct. 
* Check your spam or junk mail folders. 
* Add Binance to your email address whitelist. 
* Make sure your email client is functioning normally.
After turning on this function, you will only be able to withdraw to whitelisted withdrawal addresses. Are you sure you want to turn it on?
* To avoid risk, please don\'t withdraw to the same %1$s address twice.

When this function is turned on, your account will only be able to withdraw to whitelisted withdrawal addresses. When this function is turned off, your account is able to withdraw to any withdrawal address.
Fast: Average 10–30 mins for cryptocurrency to reach your wallet
Simplex charges 2.5% per transaction for EEA users and 3.5% for non-EEA users (10 USD minimum) Users can save 2-3% FX fee when selecting your local currency.
The crypto amount quoted is based on the current rate and is not final. If the rate changes by more than +/-2.5% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email from Simplex
Once payment is completed, you can check your payment status on Simplex and deposit history on Binance
If you have any questions, please contact Simplex customer support
Please check the details of your order are correct before continuing with the payment process.

You will now leave Binance.com and be taken to Simplex.com. Services relateling to credit card payments are provided by Simplex, which is a separate platform owned by a third party. Please read and agree to the Terms of Use of Simplex before using the service. For any questions relating to credit card payments, please contact support@simplex.com. Binance does not assume any responsibility for any loss or damage caused by the use of the credit card payment service.
I have read and agreed the disclaimer
Amount must be a positive value
That you are visiting https://www.binance.com don\'t scan QR codes from unknown sources.
The QR code has expired, Please refresh the QR Code and scan again.
Unable to recognize QR code due to your client version being too low. Please upgrade your client.
Login to see your level & fees

By default, if you hold BNB in your account, your trading fees will be automatically subtracted from your BNB balance. Using BNB for transaction fees applies a %1$s%% discount to your trading fee will be applied (subject to change).
Trading fees are determined based on trading volume over a 30-day period (in BTC) and BNB balance.
At %1$s AM (UTC) every day, your trading volume over the past 30-day period and your current BNB balance are evaluated. Your Tier level and corresponding maker/taker fees are updated %2$s hour later.
Total value must be at least %1$s
Feedback lets you send error logs about our products. We welcome problem reports.
Since there is no further query from you for a while, Bibi will leave this conversation after %1$s seconds. If you want to continue the service, please send us your questions.
Due to long time no response, your last session was ended.
I have read and agreed to the disclaimer

Margin trading confers a higher profit potential than traditional trading, but also greater risks. Please be aware that in the event of extreme margin volatility, there is even a risk that your assets may be liquidated.
Please enter an amount no higher than your available balance.
Margin Level = Total Asset Value / ( Total Borrowed Value + Total Accrued Interest Value )
Account Equity = Total balance - Total Debt
An 1-hour interest will accrue as soon as tokens are borrowed and it will continue to accrue every hour
Please enter an amount no higher than your borrow limit
If you are not repaying 100%% of your debt, the maximum you can repay at this time is %1$s
Please enter an amount no lower than %1$s

Your wallet is empty no coins for you to repay

Dear User, as per our Terms of Use, we are unable to provide services to your account going forward. We appreciate your continued support.
Currently, there is a lack of loanable assets in this currency.
Binance has detected a recent increase in fraudulent activities, such as:
Advertisements guaranteeing profit by following advice from investment "experts".
Individuals impersonating Binance or other support representatives on social media.
Offers of exclusive sales for Binance Launchpad coins.
Please check all the activities on the Binance. Don\'t trust information from other sources.

%1$s（real name：%2$s）has marked the order as paid. Please confirm that you have received the payment and release the asset. Please note: Make sure to log into your account and confirm that you have received the payment before releasing the asset to avoid loss.
Your payment has been received, the asset %s have been sent to your account.
